name: @superfluid-finance/subgraph
description: Subgraph for the Superfluid Ethereum contracts.

scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy superfluid-test --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --version-label v1.0.0
scripts.build-and-deploy-local: yarn prepare-local && yarn set-network-local && yarn getAbi && yarn generate-sf-meta-local && yarn codegen && yarn create-local && yarn deploy-local
scripts.deploy:feature:matic: yarn prepare:feature:matic && yarn set-network:feature:matic && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-feature-matic yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:feature:goerli: yarn prepare:feature:goerli && yarn set-network:feature:goerli && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-feature-goerli yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:dev:goerli: yarn prepare:dev:goerli && yarn set-network:dev:goerli && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-dev-goerli yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:dev:rinkeby: yarn prepare:dev:rinkeby && yarn set-network:dev:rinkeby && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-dev-rinkeby yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:dev:ropsten: yarn prepare:dev:ropsten && yarn set-network:dev:ropsten && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-dev-ropsten yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:dev:kovan: yarn prepare:dev:kovan && yarn set-network:dev:kovan && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-dev-kovan yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:dev:mumbai: yarn prepare:dev:mumbai && yarn set-network:dev:mumbai && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-dev-mumbai yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:dev:xdai: yarn prepare:dev:xdai && yarn set-network:dev:xdai && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-dev-xdai yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:dev:matic: yarn prepare:dev:matic && yarn set-network:dev:matic && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-dev-matic yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:v1:goerli: yarn prepare:v1:goerli && yarn set-network:v1:goerli && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-v1-goerli yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:v1:rinkeby: yarn prepare:v1:rinkeby && yarn set-network:v1:rinkeby && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-v1-rinkeby yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:v1:ropsten: yarn prepare:v1:ropsten && yarn set-network:v1:ropsten && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-v1-ropsten yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:v1:kovan: yarn prepare:v1:kovan && yarn set-network:v1:kovan && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-v1-kovan yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:v1:mumbai: yarn prepare:v1:mumbai && yarn set-network:v1:mumbai && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-v1-mumbai yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:v1:xdai: yarn prepare:v1:xdai && yarn set-network:v1:xdai && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-v1-xdai yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:v1:matic: yarn prepare:v1:matic && yarn set-network:v1:matic && SUBGRAPH_NAME=superfluid-finance/protocol-v1-matic yarn deploy
scripts.lint:js-eslint: eslint . --max-warnings=0 --report-unused-disable-directives --fix && echo 'âœ”  Your .js files look good.'
